name: Fetchq CONSOLE
description: Fetchq REST API and Console application

FETCHQ_CONSOLE_PASSWORD.description: A secret password for logging you into the web console.

NODE_ENV.description: NodeJS environment, it might affect the amount of logging.

PG_USE_SSL.description: Forces Fetchq to connect to the PostgreSQL db using SSL.

JWT_SECRET.description: Used to secure your login to the Console, set it to a strong password.

JWT_DURATION.description: Defines how long a login will be valid. The shorter the better.
